p: In the near future we shall have the opportunity to evaluate international, national, regional and individual hospitals registries and response to the emergency. Many lessons will be learned and we hope the outcome will be a better coordinated response. We live in a digital age and therefore transmission of information should be possible and rapid. The military have expertise in triage and managing mass casualty situations. We should be drawing on their expertise and ability to train for and practice for such scenarios. Many countries are putting these plans into place and amongst those with such expertise are Orthopaedic and Trauma surgeons.
